trans-unit.source: Makes the associated input control a required field.
trans-unit.target: 將相關聯的輸入控制項作為必要的欄位。

trans-unit.source: Use this control to make an input control a required field.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用此控制項可讓輸入的控制項的必要的欄位。

trans-unit.source: The input control fails validation if its value does not change from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator.InitialValue%2A> property upon losing focus.
trans-unit.target: 如果其值不會變更驗證會失敗的輸入的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator.InitialValue%2A>屬性在失去焦點時。

trans-unit.source: Multiple validators can be associated with the same input control.
trans-unit.target: 多個驗證可以與相同的輸入控制項產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator> can be used to ensure input to a control, while at the same time a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RangeValidator> can be used to ensure that the input is within a specified data range.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator>可以用於確保輸入至控制項，在同一時間而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RangeValidator>可以用於確保輸入是指定的資料範圍內。

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator> control inside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control, make sure that the validator control and the control it is associated with are in the same panel.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator>內控制<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制，請確定驗證程式控制項以及與其相關聯的控制項是在相同的面板。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control for partial-page updates, see [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關使用<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制局部網頁更新，請參閱[局部網頁呈現概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49)。

trans-unit.source: For additional information on validation controls, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關驗證控制項的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator>。

trans-unit.source: Accessibility
trans-unit.target: 協助工具選項

trans-unit.source: For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何設定這個控制項，使其產生符合網頁可及性標準標記資訊，請參閱[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator> control to make sure that the user enters a value into the text box.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator>控制項，以確定使用者在文字方塊中輸入值。

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator>類別。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />，代表要於用戶端呈現 HTML 內容的輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: Adds the HTML attributes and styles that need to be rendered for the control to the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將需要呈現給控制項的 HTML 屬性和樣式加入至指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 物件中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator.AddAttributesToRender%2A> method in a custom server control so that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator> error message always displays as bold.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator.AddAttributesToRender%2A>自訂的伺服器控制項中的方法，讓<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator>一律會顯示錯誤訊息為粗體。

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: Called during the validation stage when ASP.NET processes a Web Form.
trans-unit.target: 在 ASP.NET 處理 Web 表單時於驗證階段呼叫。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the value in the input control is valid; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果輸入控制項中的值有效，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator.EvaluateIsValid%2A> method in a custom server control so that it always returns `false` if the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator> is null or empty, and always returns `true` otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator.EvaluateIsValid%2A>自訂的伺服器中的方法控制，好讓它永遠都會傳回`false`如果的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator>是 null 或空的且一律傳回`true`否則。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the initial value of the associated input control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定相關輸入控制項的初始值。

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies the initial value of the associated input control.
trans-unit.target: 指定相關輸入控制項初始值的字串。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the initial value of the input control.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性指定的輸入控制項的初始值。

trans-unit.source: Validation fails only if the value of the associated input control matches this <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator.InitialValue%2A> upon losing focus.
trans-unit.target: 驗證失敗，只有當相關聯輸入控制項的值符合這個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator.InitialValue%2A>在失去焦點時。

trans-unit.source: The strings in both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator.InitialValue%2A> property and the input control are trimmed to remove extra spaces before and after the string before validation is performed.
trans-unit.target: 在字串<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator.InitialValue%2A>屬性和輸入的控制項將遭到修剪之前所要移除額外的空格字串前後執行驗證。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator.InitialValue%2A> property to ensure that the user enters a value in the text box.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator.InitialValue%2A>屬性，以確保使用者在文字方塊中輸入值。

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator.InitialValue%2A> property to ensure that the user selects an item from the list box.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator.InitialValue%2A>屬性，以確保使用者會從清單方塊選取項目。
